alternateName: Student achievement in secondary education of two Portuguese schools.

distribution.name: archive.zip
distribution.description: Archive containing all the contents of the  Student Performance Data Set dataset

distribution.name: student-por.csv
distribution.description:
Retrieved from:
https://archive.ics.uci.edu/ml/datasets/Student+Performance

Source:
Paulo Cortez, University of Minho, GuimarÃ£es, Portugal, http://www3.dsi.uminho.pt/pcortez

Data Set Information:

This data approach student achievement in secondary education of two Portuguese schools. The data attributes include student grades, demographic, social and school related features) and it was collected by using school reports and questionnaires. Two datasets are provided regarding the performance in two distinct subjects: Mathematics (mat) and Portuguese language (por). In [Cortez and Silva, 2008], the two datasets were modeled under binary/five-level classification and regression tasks. Important note: the target attribute G3 has a strong correlation with attributes G2 and G1. This occurs because G3 is the final year grade (issued at the 3rd period), while G1 and G2 correspond to the 1st and 2nd period grades. It is more difficult to predict G3 without G2 and G1, but such prediction is much more useful (see paper source for more details).

Attribute Information: 32 columns

Citation Request:

Please include this citation if you plan to use this database:

P. Cortez and A. Silva. Using Data Mining to Predict Secondary School Student Performance. In A. Brito and J. Teixeira Eds., Proceedings of 5th FUture BUsiness TEChnology Conference (FUBUTEC 2008) pp. 5-12, Porto, Portugal, April, 2008, EUROSIS, ISBN 978-9077381-39-7.
[Web Link]

field.name: school
field.description: student's school (binary: 'GP' - Gabriel Pereira or 'MS' - Mousinho da Silveira)

field.name: sex
field.description: student's sex (binary: 'F' - female or 'M' - male)

field.name: age
field.description: student's age (numeric: from 15 to 22)

field.name: address
field.description: student's home address type (binary: 'U' - urban or 'R' - rural)

field.name: famsize
field.description: family size (binary: 'LE3' - less or equal to 3 or 'GT3' - greater than 3)

field.name: Pstatus
field.description: parent's cohabitation status (binary: 'T' - living together or 'A' - apart)

field.name: Medu
field.description: mother's education (numeric: 0 - none, 1 - primary education (4th grade), 2 â€“ 5th to 9th grade, 3 â€“ secondary education or 4 â€“ higher education)

field.name: Fedu
field.description: father's education (numeric: 0 - none, 1 - primary education (4th grade), 2 â€“ 5th to 9th grade, 3 â€“ secondary education or 4 â€“ higher education)

field.name: Mjob
field.description: mother's job (nominal: 'teacher', 'health' care related, civil 'services' (e.g. administrative or police), 'at_home' or 'other')

field.name: Fjob
field.description: father's job (nominal: 'teacher', 'health' care related, civil 'services' (e.g. administrative or police), 'at_home' or 'other')

field.name: reason
field.description: reason to choose this school (nominal: close to 'home', school 'reputation', 'course' preference or 'other')

field.name: guardian
field.description: student's guardian (nominal: 'mother', 'father' or 'other')

field.name: traveltime
field.description: home to school travel time (numeric: 1 - <15 min., 2 - 15 to 30 min., 3 - 30 min. to 1 hour, or 4 - >1 hour)

field.name: studytime
field.description: weekly study time (numeric: 1 - <2 hours, 2 - 2 to 5 hours, 3 - 5 to 10 hours, or 4 - >10 hours)

field.name: failures
field.description: number of past class failures (numeric: n if 1<=n<3, else 4)

field.name: schoolsup
field.description: extra educational support (binary: yes or no)

field.name: famsup
field.description: family educational support (binary: yes or no)

field.name: paid
field.description: extra paid classes within the course subject (Math or Portuguese) (binary: yes or no)

field.name: activities
field.description: extra-curricular activities (binary: yes or no)

field.name: nursery
field.description: attended nursery school (binary: yes or no)

field.name: higher
field.description: wants to take higher education (binary: yes or no)

field.name: internet
field.description: Internet access at home (binary: yes or no)

field.name: romantic
field.description: with a romantic relationship (binary: yes or no)

field.name: famrel
field.description: quality of family relationships (numeric: from 1 - very bad to 5 - excellent)

field.name: freetime
field.description: free time after school (numeric: from 1 - very low to 5 - very high)

field.name: goout
field.description: going out with friends (numeric: from 1 - very low to 5 - very high)

field.name: Dalc
field.description: workday alcohol consumption (numeric: from 1 - very low to 5 - very high)

field.name: Walc
field.description: weekend alcohol consumption (numeric: from 1 - very low to 5 - very high)

field.name: health
field.description: current health status (numeric: from 1 - very bad to 5 - very good)

field.name: absences
field.description: number of school absences (numeric: from 0 to 93)

field.name: G1
field.description: first period grade (numeric: from 0 to 20)

field.name: G2
field.description: second period grade (numeric: from 0 to 20)

field.name: G3
field.description: final grade (numeric: from 0 to 20, output target)
